Day 3 of Our Alaskan Cruise- Arrival in Juneau, Alaska, and Glacier Trek

Blue ice is recently exposed ice. Glacier ice turns white only after exposed to oxygen.




Rough terrain for hiking. So that is why cleats were issued!

Not exactly a walk in the park!
Blue pools of water since ice under water is not exposed to oxygen!
Sipping water that came from glacier ice.
